name: Shadow Universe
description:
Important Note: If the game won't load on itch, you can play on https://flamemasternxf.github.io/Shadow-Universe-/

Shadow Universe is a game about gaining Light Energy to generate Light and using that Light to light up your dark Universe. 

This game is my submission for the Void Dev Incremental Game Jam! 

Playing tips:

-This is a slower, more Idle type of Incremental. The early game is especially slow, sorry :(

-Things begin speeding up once you get a few Second Empowerments, and really start going fast once you get a Third Empowerment.

-FLIP whenever possible, it gives a massive production boost (especially once you have Conversion Upgrades to speed up the start of runs).  A lot of FLIPs will also make your Fourth Empowerments insanely powerful.
